overview: Raul Suarez is Managing Director for ZINIO International. He started the European operations for Zinio in Spain and UK in 2005 to continue afterwards with all international markets except North America. Raul has worked in the travel industry business in the early internet years (1994-2002) where he had international marketing and sales positions with specific focus to developping online commerce. He also was Director at ACCESOGROUP, a leading Media Intelligence and Communications Management Systems company based in Spain. Raul was born in Holland, speaks Dutch, German, Spanish, Portuguese and English, is graduated in Economics and with a post-graduate in International Management from Thunderbird.
